original_text: And Herodias had a grudge against him and wanted to put him to death. But she could not,
korean_text: 헤로디아가 요한을 원수로 여겨 죽이고자 하였으되 하지 못한 것은

sentences.original_text: And Herodias had a grudge against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 헤로디아는 그에게 원한을 품고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and wanted to put him to death
